title: Snapshot lifecycle guard pattern
details: MinimizedManager uses isRestoring flag on snapshots to prevent expiration race conditions during restore retry. The _handleSnapshotExpiration method checks snapshot.isRestoring and defers expiration if true. Flag is set in _setRestoreLock() and cleared in _applyAndVerifySnapshot(). DEFERRED_EXPIRATION_WAIT_MS=500ms is used for reschedule.
